page.title: 17A LOCAL FARMER'S DAY
page.content: 0730 BREAKFAST 0745 GIVE WORKERS ORDERS FOR DAY: FEED 12 BULLOCKS INDOORS: YOKE TRIPLE K HARROW: INCORPORATE TREFLAN SELECTIVE WEEDKILLER INTO SOIL PRIOR TO SOWING SWEDE TURNIPS. 1100 UNHITCH HARROW AND YOKE PRECISION TURNIP SEED DRILL: SOW SWEDE TURNIP SEED AT 4" SPACING. 1200 LUNCH 1300 FEED BULLOCKS WITH HAY: CARRY ON SOWING SWEDES - STOPPING APPROX. EVERY 15 MINUTES TO CHECK THAT ALL SEEDERS ARE WORKING ACCURATELY. FINISH APPROX 1645. 1700 TEA: READ DAILY NEWSPAPER: LISTEN TO NEWS HEADLINES ON T.V.: CHECK GREENHOUSES: WATER PLANTS AS NECESSARY 1830 COMMENCE PLANTING ONIONS - APPROX 200. 2030 WASH:SUPPER:WATCH TV 2230 BED
